DOC.brief_summary: Feasibility monocentrique opened study estimating the use of an electronic personalized educational plan (ePEP) for the follow-up by nurses of 50 patients diabetics type 1 during 6 months having an electronic pad.
DOC.criteria: patient diabetic type 1 patient with the electronic pad in a smartphone adults children between 12 and 17 years 11 months patient having signed the consent patient diabetic type 2 patient without the electronic pad in a smartphone children below 12 years old
